@description.body:

@description.name: @description
@description.body: A form virtual widget which allows a single selection. Looks somewhat like a normal button, but opens a virtual list of items to select when tapping on it.

@childControl.name: @childControl
@childControl.body: atom {qx.ui.basic.Atom} Shows the text and icon of the content.
@childControl.description: Shows the text and icon of the content.

@childControl.name: @childControl
@childControl.body:
arrow {qx.ui.basic.Image} Shows the arrow to open the drop-down
   list.
@childControl.description:
Shows the arrow to open the drop-down
   list.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Current selected items.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Flag signaling if a widget is valid. If a widget is invalid, an invalid state will be set.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Flag signaling if a widget is required.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Message which is shown in an invalid tooltip.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Message which is shown in an invalid tooltip if the {@link #required} is set to true.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
This event is fired as soon as the content of the selection property changes, but this is not equal to the change of the selection of the widget. If the selection of the widget changes, the content of the array stored in the selection property changes. This means you have to listen to the change event of the selection array to get an event as soon as the user changes the selected item. 

obj.getSelection().addListener("change", listener, this);

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fires after the value was modified

@type.name: @type
@type.body: {String} The search value to {@link #__preselect} an item.

@type.name: @type
@type.body: {qx.event.Timer} The time which triggers the search for pre-selection.

@type.name: @type
@type.body: {Array} Contains the id from all bindings.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: selected {var|null} Item to select as value.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {null|var} The currently selected item or null if there is none.
@return.description: The currently selected item or null if there is none.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: This method is called when the binding can be added to the widget. For e.q. bind the drop-down selection with the widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: This method is called when the binding can be removed from the widget. For e.q. remove the bound drop-down selection.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Listener method for "pointerover" event.

  • Adds state "hovered"
  • Removes "abandoned" and adds "pressed" state (if "abandoned" state is set)

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Listener method for "pointerout" event.

  • Removes "hovered" state
  • Adds "abandoned" and removes "pressed" state (if "pressed" state is set)

@description.name: @description
@description.body: property apply

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Preselects an item in the drop-down, when item starts with the __searchValue value.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Converts the keyIdentifier to a printable character e.q. "Space" to " ".

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Called when selection changes.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property selection. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #selection}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property selection. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #selection}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property selection. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #selection}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Set the enabled state of the widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Return the current set enabled state.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the required state of a widget.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: required {Boolean} A flag signaling if the widget is required.
@param.description: A flag signaling if the widget is required.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Return the current required state of the widget.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} True, if the widget is required.
@return.description: True, if the widget is required.

@description.name: @description
